title: Google\Cloud\Vision\V1\CropHint
name: CropHint
description:
Single crop hint that is used to generate a new crop when serving an image.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.vision.v1.CropHint

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.bounding_poly
params.description: The bounding polygon for the crop region. The coordinates of the bounding box are in the original image's scale.

params.name: data.confidence
params.description: Confidence of this being a salient region. Range [0, 1].

params.name: data.importance_fraction
params.description: Fraction of importance of this salient region with respect to the original image.
